		<script>
			springSpace.Common = springSpace.Common || { };
			
			springSpace.Common.constant = {
					PROCESSING: {
						ACTION_DISPLAY_POLL: 159
					}
			};
			springSpace.Common.baseURL = "http://guides.lib.ku.edu/";
			/*
			springSpace.guidePublicObj = new springSpace.guidePublic.GuidePublic({
				script_name: "/c.php",
				guide_id: 439372,
				page_id: 2993953,
				constant: {
					PROCESSING: {
						
					},
					CONTENT: {
						CONTENT_BOOKS: 5
					}
				}
			});
			*/
			// Hide guide attributes and subjects/tags if theyre empty.
			jQuery(function () {
				//jQuery("#s-lg-guide-header-subjects").hide();
				//jQuery("#s-lg-guide-header-tags").hide();
			});
			
			handleScroll=function() {
				var target_elt = "";
				var anchor = window.location.hash.substring(1);
				
				if (jQuery.isNumeric(anchor)) {
					xhr = jQuery.ajax({
						async: false,
						url: "/content_process.php",
						type: "POST",
						dataType: "json",
						data: {
							action: 562, 
							anchor: anchor
						},
						success: function(response, textStatus, jqXHR) {
							if ((response.data.box_id != 0) && jQuery("#s-lg-box-" + response.data.box_id)) {
								target_elt = "#s-lg-box-" + response.data.box_id;
							}
						},
						error: function (jqXHR, textStatus, errorThrown) { 
						
						}
					});
				}
				else if (false) {
					target_elt = "#s-lg-page-section-2993953";
				}
				
				if (target_elt != "") {
					jQuery("html, body").animate({ scrollTop: jQuery(target_elt).offset().top }, 750);
					if (jQuery(this).scrollTop() > 220) {
						jQuery("#s-lib-scroll-top").fadeIn(750);
					}
				}
			}
	   </script>
	   <script>
			// Enable tooltips.
			jQuery(function () {
				try {
					springSpace.UI.initPopOvers();
				} catch (e) { }
			});springSpace.springTrack.init({_st_site_id: '1788',_st_guide_id: '439372',_st_page_id: '2993953'});
			jQuery(function() {springSpace.springTrack.trackPage({_st_type_id: '1',_st_guide_id: '439372',_st_page_id: '2993953'});
			});
			jQuery(document).ready(function() {
				handleScroll();
			});
	   </script>

            <div id="s-lg-guide-header-info">
                <h1 id="s-lg-guide-name">Research Guides: Subject Guides</h1>
                <div id="s-lg-guide-desc-container" class="pad-top-med">
                    <span id="s-lg-guide-description">Welcome to KU Libraries research guides, created to aid you in finding resources by subject or course. Tutorial/Help guides are included to explain how to use the research resources available to you.</span>
                </div>

        <div id="s-lg-guide-main" class="container s-lib-main s-lib-side-borders">
            
				<div class="row s-lg-row">
    <div id="s-lg-col-126" class="col-md-12">
        <div class="s-lg-col-boxes">
        </div>
    </div>
				
</div>
				<div class="row s-lg-row">
    <div id="s-lg-col-1" class="col-md-9">
        <div class="s-lg-col-boxes">
							<div id="s-lg-box-wrapper-10847622" class="s-lg-box-wrapper-10847622">
					<div id="s-lg-box-9207113-container" class="s-lib-box-container">
						<div id="s-lg-box-9207113" class="s-lib-box s-lib-box-std">
							<h2 class="s-lib-box-title">Subject Guides
                                </h2>
							<div id="s-lg-box-collapse-9207113" >
								<div class="s-lib-box-content">
									
			<div id="s-lg-content-18654482" class="  clearfix">
				<style> #ku-subject-list .alert-info {display: none;} </style>

<div id="ku-subject-list">&nbsp;</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function (){
  jQuery.ajax(
    {
      url: "//guides.lib.ku.edu/index_process.php? " + 
           "action=172&key=0&order=0&type_id=0&owner_id=0&group_id=0&num_cols=1&search=",
      type: "GET",
      dataType: "json",
      success: function(response, textStatus, jqXHR) {
        if ( response.errCode == 200 ) {
          jQuery('#ku-subject-list').html(response.data.content);
        }
      },
      error: function (jqXHR, textStatus, errorThrown) {
        jQuery('#ku-subject-list').html(errorThrown);
      }
  }
  );
});
</script>
		   </div>
								</div>
								
							</div>
						</div>
					</div>
							</div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div id="s-lg-col-2" class="col-md-3">
        <div class="s-lg-col-boxes">
							<div id="s-lg-box-wrapper-10847632" class="s-lg-box-wrapper-10847632">
					<div id="s-lg-box-2056370-container" class="s-lib-box-container">
						<div id="s-lg-box-2056370" class="s-lib-box s-lib-box-std">
							<h2 class="s-lib-box-title">Research Help
                                </h2>
							<div id="s-lg-box-collapse-2056370" >
								<div class="s-lib-box-content">
									
			<div id="s-lg-content-3726609" class="  clearfix">
				<p style="margin-top: .5em">We can <a href="http://lib.ku.edu/node/1308">help with your research questions</a> -- contact us by chat, phone, email, text or at a Research Help desk.</p>
<!-- Begin libraryh3lp widget -->

<div class="libraryh3lp" jid="kulibrarian1@chat.libraryh3lp.com" style="display: none">
<div id="chat-container"><iframe frameborder="0" src="//libraryh3lp.com/chat/kulibrarian1@chat.libraryh3lp.com?skin=10224&amp;theme=simpletext&amp;title=Ask%20a%20Librarian&amp;identity=librarian&amp;css=//dept.ku.edu/~libasset/assets/css/chat.css" style="width: 100%; height: 350px;"></iframe></div>
</div>
<!-- End libraryh3lp widget --><script type="text/javascript">
  $(function(){
    $('#chat-now').click(function(event){
      event.preventDefault();
      $(this).toggleClass('open');
      $('#chat-container').slideToggle('slow');
    });
  });
</script><script type="text/javascript">
  (function() {
    var x = document.createElement("script"); x.type = "text/javascript"; x.async = true;
    x.src = (document.location.protocol === "https:" ? "https://" : "http://") + "libraryh3lp.com/js/libraryh3lp.js?multi";
    var y = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0]; y.parentNode.insertBefore(x, y);
  })();
</script>
		   </div>
								</div>
								
							</div>
						</div>
					</div>
							</div>
        </div>
    </div>
				
</div>
				<div class="row s-lg-row">
    <div id="s-lg-col-127" class="col-md-12">
        <div class="s-lg-col-boxes">
        </div>
    </div>
				
</div>

href='https://documents.ku.edu/policies/IOA/Nondiscrimination.htm'>prohibits                        discrimination</a> on the basis of race, color, ethnicity, religion, sex, national origin, age,                    ancestry, disability, status as a veteran, sexual orientation, marital status, parental status,                    gender identity, gender expression and genetic information in the University's programs and                    activities. The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding the                    non-discrimination policies: Director of the Office of Institutional Opportunity and Access, <a                        href="mailto:ioa@ku.edu" style='color:#ccc'>IOA@ku.edu</a>, 1246 W. Campus Road, Room 153A,                    Lawrence, KS, 66045, (785)864-6414, 711 TTY.                </p>            </section>        </div>    </section></footer><script type="text/javascript" async="" src="//libraryh3lp.com/js/libraryh3lp.js?multi"></script><script type="text/javascript">  $(document).ready(function() {    /**     * Main menu     */    $('#mobile_menu_toplink > a').click(function(e) {      e.preventDefault();      $('#mobile_search_toplink').removeClass('open');      $(this).parent().toggleClass('open');    });    $('#mobile_search_toplink > a').click(function(e) {      e.preventDefault();      $('#mobile_menu_toplink').removeClass('open');      $(this).parent().toggleClass('open');    });  });</script>
